metadata.title: User Management - User Management platform
metadata.description: Manage users efficiently with full authentication using the reqres.in API. View users, explore profiles, and handle access securely.

twitter.title: User Management - Manage Users Seamlessly
twitter.description: Full-featured user management dashboard with authentication and detailed user insights, powered by the reqres.in API.
twitter.creator: @usermanagement

dashboard.title: User Management Dashboard
dashboard.description: Access a secure and intuitive dashboard to view, manage, and explore users with authenticated sessions.
dashboard.keywords: user management, auth dashboard, reqres API, user listing, user details, login system

users.title: User Profiles & Management
users.description: Browse and manage user profiles, check details, and control access levels through a seamless UI.
users.keywords: user profiles, user details, authentication, reqres users, user dashboard
